data.name: plSourceDirectory.Help
data.value: Directory where Forum install lives. (Read Only)

data.name: plAggregatedForums.Help
data.value: Select whether you would like to provide an aggregated view of threads in all public forums.

data.name: plDefaultForum.Help
data.value: Select the default forum to be used for posting within the Aggregated Forum view.

data.name: plThreadsPerPage.Help
data.value:
The number of threads displayed on one page at once.
NOTE
Per user settings this is overriden. Applicable to unauthenticated users ONLY.

data.name: plPostsPerPage.Help
data.value:
The number of posts displayed on one page at once.
NOTE
Per user settings this is overriden. Applicable to unauthenticated users ONLY.

data.name: plPopularPostsView.Help
data.value: The number of post views before a thread becomes popular.

data.name: plPopularPostsReply.Help
data.value: The number of post replies before a thread becomes popular.

data.name: plSkin.Help
data.value:
The theme used for this forum module.
The checkox, if checked, allows users to pick their own theme from the list.
Tip
Themes are in the Forum\Skins folder.

data.name: plTimeZone.Help
data.value:
If checked, users will see the time in their default format based on culture as well as adjusted to their local timezone.

You must have the country resource pack installed for users to see in their local format.

data.name: plTemplateEmail.Help
data.value: The skin template used for outgoing emails.

data.name: plAutomatedAddress.Help
data.value: The FROM email address used if the Show Sender Address is not checked.

data.name: plAttachment.Help
data.value: If checked, enables users to attach files to forum posts.

data.name: plAttachmentFolder.Help
data.value: The folder to store post attachment files.

data.name: plWhatsNew.Help
data.value: When checked, displays the whats new info panel in forum home page.

data.name: plWhatsNewTemplate.Help
data.value: Select template for whats new panel.

data.name: plScrollDelay.Help
data.value: Scroll delay value of Whats New marquee.

data.name: plScrollAmount.Help
data.value: Scroll amount value of Whats New marquee.

data.name: plRSSFeeds.Help
data.value: Generate RSS feeds for all public forums.

data.name: plRSSThreadsPerFeed.Help
data.value: Number of threads displayed per RSS feed.

data.name: plUserOnline.Help
data.value: If checked, displays user online status, overridable by user settings.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
Forum - Forum Settings

This area is accessible only by administrators. Administrators can configure the module to better suit their needs here.

data.name: plShowNavigator.Help
data.value: If checked, this shows the Solpart navigation menu.

data.name: plDisplayPosterLocation.Help
data.value: The selected item determines who sees the posters country of origin.

data.name: plEnablePMSystem.Help
data.value: If checked, the forum will allow users to send private messages to one another.

data.name: plEnableMemberList.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to view a list of members of the forum.

data.name: plSearchIndexDate.Help
data.value: This is the date the module was last indexed by the framework's search engine. Click the Reset Date link to make all previous posts exposed to search again.

data.name: plAnonDownloads.Help
data.value:
If checked, downloads are available to all users who can view post.
Tip
File permissions also control access to files.

data.name: plDisableHTMLPosting.Help
data.value: If checked, the rich text editor will not be rendered for posts, instead a multi-line textbox will be used.

data.name: plEnablePostAbuse.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to report each post to moderators/admins using an online interface.

data.name: plEnableThreadStatus.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to set thread status if they started the thread.This is good for things like marking posts as an answer.

data.name: plNameDisplay.Help
data.value: This is the format the sites users will appear to users of this forum module.

data.name: plPerUserTheme.Help
data.value: If checked, users can choose any themes available for the module to override your set theme above. This only ovverrides users who are logged in.

data.name: plUseIconBar.Help
data.value: If checked, the module will render icons instead of links for the module actions (search, my posts, my settings, etc).

data.name: plImageExtension.Help
data.value: Temporary setting to control image extension used in forum theme.

data.name: plTrustNewUsers.Help
data.value:
If checked, all new forum users will be trusted by default. This means they will not require moderation in moderated forums.
NOTE
This will not update existing users status. It only affects users who have not visited a forum module per portal install.

data.name: plAutoLockTrust.Help
data.value:
If checked, only administrators and not moderators can change the status of a user's trust level for newly created forum users.
NOTE
User trust level locking is controlled on a per users basis.

data.name: plEnableScripts.Help
data.value:
If checked, the png javascript fix will be enabled to support transparent png files
NOTE
This only affects IE 5.5 and IE 6 users.

data.name: plEnableHTMLSignatures.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be permitted to use HTML code in their signatures.

data.name: plEnableIconBarAsImages.Help
data.value: If checked, the forum theme will render icons instead of text links for the navigation toolbar at the top of most forum user interfaces.

data.name: plEnableModSigUpdates.Help
data.value: If checked, moderators will be able to update users signatures from the user profile area viewable by all users.

data.name: plEnableUserBanning.Help
data.value: If checked, administrators and moderators can ban users from posting.

data.name: plEnableUserSignatures.Help
data.value: If checked, users will be able to add a custom signature to their profile in the forum module. This will display in all posts as well as the users profile.

data.name: plNoFollowWeb.Help
data.value:
If checked, indicates that the destination of user website hyperlinks SHOULD NOT be afforded any additional weight or ranking by user agents which perform link analysis upon web pages (e.g. search engines).
NOTE
This applies to user profile page website links as well as user website links in posts.

data.name: plOverrideTitle.Help
data.value: If checked, the page title set by DotNetNuke will be overriden with the forum name or thread name depending on view.

data.name: plTTL.Help
data.value: Time to live is the number of minutes that indicates how long a channel can be cached before refreshing from the source.
